title: Urinetown

fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- No factional chat
- No factional kill
- Counts as good
- "The CEO" 4497 must spawn
- Urinetown roles have both Subalignments and Sub-Subalignments
- Urinetown starts with 1/3rd of its members as Corporate and the rest as Commoners
- During the day, there's an additional vote to Promote. If a Commoner is promoted, they will turn into a random Corporate role of the same sub-subalignment. If an non-Urinetown player is Promoted, they now appear innocent and secretly learn the role of one player of their choice.
- All Corporate players can visit a player at night in addition to their normal night ability
- Being hanged is called "Being sent to Urinetown"
- Players should not be informed by the host that there is no Urinetown and they instead just push people off of buildings and that's called Urinetown

desc:
*"What type of faction is this?"*
*"An original one"*
